## IsEmptyArray type

判断 `T` 是否是空数组。

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type IsEmptyArray<T> = T extends any[] ? T extends NonEmptyArray<any> ? false : true : false;
```
<b>References:</b> [NonEmptyArray](./types.nonemptyarray.md)

## Example


```typescript
type X = IsEmptyArray<[]>
// => true

```
